This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS offset-distance default is 0px 
PASS offset-distance 0 is 0px 
PASS offset-distance can be positive 
PASS offset-distance allows negative values 
PASS offset-distance can be a percentage 
PASS offset-distance can be explicitly inherited 
PASS offset-distance is not inherited by default 
PASS offset-distance style can be set inline 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
